body_html: @SsnL I am pretty sure that the implement of _batch_lowrank_mahalanobis or _batch_potrf_lower,... is not quite relevant. I disable the Mahalanobis term, errors still happen. Instead of potrf_lower, I did matrix.exp().tril(), errors still happen. To me, the error is relevant to the combo of expand, stack,...
body_text: @SsnL I am pretty sure that the implement of _batch_lowrank_mahalanobis or _batch_potrf_lower,... is not quite relevant. I disable the Mahalanobis term, errors still happen. body: @SsnL I am pretty sure that the implement of `_batch_lowrank_mahalanobis` or `_batch_potrf_lower`,... is not quite relevant. I disable the Mahalanobis term, errors still happen. Instead of potrf_lower, I did `matrix.exp().tril()`, errors still happen. To me, the error is relevant to the combo of `expand`, `stack`,...
